original_text: When I was there with you, I showed that I was a true apostle. I worked patiently among you. I did many miracles and great things that showed God's power.
korean_text: 사도의 표가 된 것은 내가 너희 가운데서 모든 참음과 표적과 기사와 능력을 행한 것이라

sentences.original_text: When I was there with you
I showed that I was a true apostle
and great things that showed God's power
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 권능을 나타내는 위대한 일들을 했다
